settings.content: Worldwide Shipping Available

settings.title: Newsletter
settings.content: Sign up and be the first to know about new product launches and exclusives.

settings.title: Our story
settings.content: Add your own custom content to explain your processes...

settings.title: Popup
settings.content: You can use this popup to display some useful information to your customers.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here in the UAE will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: Can I return my product?
settings.answer:
Refunds & Returns
Our merchandise is Final Sale, and may not be returned or exchanged unless damaged or defective.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be damaged and defective, and unused in the same condition that you received it. It must be unopened in the original packaging. 

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer. 

Exchanges (if applicable) 
We only replace items if they are damaged or defective. If you need to exchange it for the same item, please contact us immediately and include photo evidence.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page. We will be happy to assist you.
